title: New Employee Benefits Enrollment
description: A newly hired staff member needs help completing their benefits enrollment before the deadline.

tasks.description: Identify the new employee and confirm their enrollment deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the employee has 3 days left to enroll.

tasks.description: Walk the employee through the different health plan options and retirement contributions in the HR portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the options and helps the employee navigate the portal.

tasks.description: Confirm that the employee's selections have been successfully submitted in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the enrollment is complete in the HR system.
